tool_description: Analyzes a child's developmental stage and provides insights into their cognitive, physical, social, and emotional readiness for different types of learning activities.

areas_of_interest.description: Developmental areas to focus analysis on: cognitive, physical, social, emotional, language

error_messages: Invalid age: child_age_months must be between 6 and 216 months.
Invalid developmental area: Use areas from [cognitive, physical, social, emotional, language].
Milestone format error: Observed milestones should be brief descriptive phrases.
usage: Provide the child's age in months. Optionally include recently observed milestones and specify which developmental areas to focus the analysis on.

cognitive_readiness.description: Assessment of cognitive development and learning readiness

physical_readiness.description: Assessment of physical development and motor skill readiness

social_emotional_readiness.description: Assessment of social and emotional development readiness

recommended_challenges.description: Types of appropriate developmental challenges to include in activities

areas_to_support.description: Developmental areas that could benefit from additional support
